definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: It's my Daddy, the actor, about to die with his boots on.
sentences.chinese: 那是我爸爸，那個演員，即將橫死的畫面。

sentences.english: After a child's violent death, the calculations are murkier.
sentences.chinese: 在一個孩子橫死之後，內心的盤算會變得更加陰晦。

sentences.english: He will not suffer from unnatural death.
She sobbed out the story of her son's violent death.
sentences.chinese: 她哭著訴說兒子橫死的經過。

sentences.english: He swore that he would die within 7 days if it were true he gained his assets illegally.
sentences.chinese: 他信還發誓如果其資產證實爲非法所得，7日內橫死。

definition: to plot and kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to pick a quarrel/to start a fight
variant of 兇惡|凶恶, fierce/ferocious/fiendish/frightening
